ygData.subject: Re: New Bard Songs???
ygData.msgSnippet: there is a level 44 song in erudin, cassindra s elegy, using singing skill. none of the songs work yet as far as i know (i can only try level 30 and 38 songs).
ygData.messageBody:
there is a level 44 song in erudin, cassindra's elegy, using singing skill.
none of the songs work yet as far as i know (i can only try level 30 and 38
songs). they say target too far away no matter what. you can target
yourself and cast them but they are damage songs so that doesn't help much.

Shada Silverleaf, level 39 bard, Mith Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Alex Candelaria [mailto:candel@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 9:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard Songs???


From: "Alex Candelaria" <candel@...>

found in Highpass today on the Bard Son Vendor

Selo's Chords of Cessation
Level: 48
Stringed Instruments


-Alex
aka: Goatnatos, Lvl 19 Bard, Povar Server
